verses.verse: When <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H776>land<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee, and thou <S%H3423>succeedest<s%> them, and <S%H3427>dwellest<s%> in their <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and in their <S%H1004>houses;<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H914>separate<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> for thee in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thy <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

Thou shalt <S%H3559>prepare<s%> thee a <S%H1870>way,<s%> and <S%H8027>divide<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1366>coasts<s%> of thy <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> giveth thee to <S%H5157>inherit,<s%> into three parts, that <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7523>slayer<s%> <S%H1961>may<s%> <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H8033>thither.<s%>

And <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H1697>case<s%> of the <S%H7523>slayer,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H8033>thither,<s%> that he may <S%H2425>live:<s%> <S%H834>Whoso<s%> <S%H5221>killeth<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H1907>ignorantly,<s%> <S%H1947><s%> whom <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> in <S%H8032>time<s%> <S%H4480>past;<s%> <S%H8657><s%>

As when a <S%H834>man<s%> <S%H935>goeth<s%> into the <S%H3293>wood<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> to <S%H2404>hew<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and his <S%H3027>hand<s%> fetcheth a <S%H5080>stroke<s%> with the <S%H1631>axe<s%> to cut <S%H3772>down<s%> the <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and the <S%H1270>head<s%> <S%H5394>slippeth<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H6086>helve,<s%> and lighteth <S%H4672>upon<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> that he <S%H4191>die;<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and live: <S%H2425><s%>

Lest <S%H6435><s%> the <S%H1350>avenger<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H310><s%> the <S%H7523>slayer,<s%> <S%H3588>while<s%> his <S%H3824>heart<s%> is <S%H3179>hot,<s%> and <S%H5381>overtake<s%> him, <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> is <S%H7235>long,<s%> and <S%H5221>slay<s%> <S%H5315>him;<s%> whereas he was <S%H369>not<s%> worthy of <S%H4941>death,<s%> <S%H4194><s%> inasmuch <S%H3588>as<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H8130>hated<s%> him <S%H3808>not<s%> in <S%H8032>time<s%> <S%H4480>past.<s%> <S%H8543><s%>
Wherefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> thee, <S%H559>saying,<s%> Thou shalt <S%H914>separate<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> for thee.

And <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7337>enlarge<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H1366>coast,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> he hath <S%H7650>sworn<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853>thee<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1696>promised<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers;<s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>these<s%> <S%H4687>commandments<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> them, <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day,<s%> to <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> and to <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H3605>ever<s%> <S%H3117><s%> in his <S%H1870>ways;<s%> then shalt thou <S%H3254>add<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> for thee, <S%H5921>beside<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> three: <S%H7969><s%>

That <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> be <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H7130>in<s%> thy <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee for an <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> and so <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee.

But <S%H3588>if<s%> any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1961>hate<s%> <S%H8130><s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and lie in <S%H693>wait<s%> for him, and rise <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him, and <S%H5221>smite<s%> him <S%H5315>mortally<s%> that he <S%H4191>die,<s%> and <S%H5127>fleeth<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H411>these<s%> cities: <S%H5892><s%>

Then the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H7971>send<s%> and <S%H3947>fetch<s%> him <S%H4480>thence,<s%> <S%H8033><s%> and <S%H5414>deliver<s%> him into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1350>avenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood,<s%> that he may <S%H4191>die.<s%>

Thine <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2347>pity<s%> <S%H5921><s%> him, but thou shalt put <S%H1197>away<s%> the guilt of <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> from <S%H4480>Israel,<s%> <S%H3478><s%> that it may go <S%H2895>well<s%> with thee.

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5253>remove<s%> thy <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H1366>landmark,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they of old <S%H7223>time<s%> have <S%H1379>set<s%> in thine <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou shalt <S%H5157>inherit<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

One <S%H259><s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> rise <S%H6965>up<s%> against a <S%H376>man<s%> for <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> or for <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2403>sin,<s%> in <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2399>sin<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he <S%H2398>sinneth:<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses,<s%> shall the <S%H1697>matter<s%> be <S%H6965>established.<s%>
If <S%H3588><s%> a <S%H2555>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> rise <S%H6965>up<s%> against any <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H6030>testify<s%> against him that which is <S%H5627>wrong;<s%>

Then <S%H8147>both<s%> the <S%H376>men,<s%> between <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H7379>controversy<s%> is, shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H8199>judges,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%>

And the <S%H8199>judges<s%> shall make diligent <S%H1875>inquisition:<s%> <S%H3190><s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H5707>witness<s%> be a <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness,<s%> and hath <S%H6030>testified<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%> against his <S%H251>brother;<s%>

Then shall ye <S%H6213>do<s%> unto him, <S%H834>as<s%> he had <S%H2161>thought<s%> to have <S%H6213>done<s%> unto his <S%H251>brother:<s%> so shalt thou put the evil <S%H1197>away<s%> <S%H7451><s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H7130><s%> you.

And those which <S%H7604>remain<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and <S%H3372>fear,<s%> and shall <S%H3254>henceforth<s%> <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H1697>any<s%> <S%H2088>such<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you.

And thine <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2347>pity;<s%> but <S%H5315>life<s%> shall go for <S%H5315>life,<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> for <S%H5869>eye,<s%> <S%H8127>tooth<s%> for <S%H8127>tooth,<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> for <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H7272>foot<s%> for <S%H7272>foot.<s%>
